inputs.name: items
inputs.text: A collection containing all data models of the current group.

inputs.name: selection
inputs.text: A collection which will contain the selected data models..

outputs.name: selectionOnChange
outputs.text: Emits when an item is selected. Event's payload equals to the current selection list.

api.name: ObNavigableDirective
api.usage: Set on an nav-tree, it will allow to navigate the tree while maintaining the focus on the filter input.

inputs.name: obNavigable
inputs.text: The data model of the current navigable item.

inputs.name: navigableActivate
inputs.text: Controls activation of the navigable item.

inputs.name: navigableFocusOnInit
inputs.text: Defines if the navigable item should be focused on directive initialisation.

inputs.name: navigableHighlight
inputs.text: Controls highlighting of the navigable item.

outputs.name: navigableOnActivation
outputs.text: Emits when a navigable item is activated.

outputs.name: navigableOnChange
outputs.text: Emits when UP or DOWN key is pressed while a navigable item is focused.

outputs.name: navigableOnFocus
outputs.text: Emits whena navigable item is focused.

outputs.name: navigableOnMouseDown
outputs.text: Emits whena navigable item is clicked.

outputs.name: navigableOnMouseDown
outputs.text: Emits whena navigable item is moved.
